document.topic_text: IFX Networks was named LATAM Service Provider of the Year by Veeam Software PR Newswire BOGOTÁ, Colombia, April 21, 2016 BOGOTÁ, Colombia , April 21, 2016 /PRNewswire/ — IFX Networks, a leading provider of integrated communication services, was recognized by Veeam Software, the innovative provider of solutions that deliver Availability for the Always-On Enterprise™, as LATAM’s Service Provider of the Year. The inaugural 2015 Veeam Impact Partner Awards™ recognized LATAM’s Veeam ProPartners which demonstrated success in providing Veeam Availability solutions to their customers, and provided first-class support, expert knowledge, continued product education, and a true Veeam strategy incorporated into their business. IFX Networks was recognized as Veeam LATAM Service Provider of the Year for embracing, marketing, and selling Veeam cloud-based solutions, and for its dedication to the continued development of Veeam business. “To be recognized by VEEAM as a top business partner for the region is of great motivation for our team, which focuses every day on providing real value to our customers based on, knowledge and experience,” said Samuel Mezrahi , President of IFX Networks. “We are excited to recognize and honor to IFX Networks as the Veeam LATAM Service Provider of the Year,” said Vitaly Sukhovsky, Vice President of LATAM Sales at Veeam. “Our partnership with IFX Networks has enabled us to provide Veeam Availability solutions to our joint customers, empowering them to meet the ongoing demands of the 24/7, Always-On Enterprise. We extend our congratulations to IFX Networks and look forward to an even more successful 2016.” About IFX Networks Multinational Telecom Neutral Carrier with presence across LATAM providing the largest connectivity network and localized cloud infrastructure. Established 16 years ago, IFX focuses on helping your brand consolidate your telecom needs and become your IT ally locally and regionally. For more information visit us online @ www.ifxnetworks.com To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/ifx-networks-was-named-latam-service-provider-of-the-year-by-veeam-software-300255481.html SOURCE IFX Networks Awards , Computers and Software , Multimedia/Internet/Online Services .
